rules_text:
Flying, trample
[i]Hawk King Claw[/i] – When Tibarn, Lord of the Air enters, destroy target artifact or enchantment you don't control.
[i]King of Pheonicis[/i] – Creature spells you cast with flying cost {2} less to cast. Other creatures you control with flying have ward {2}.
Partner with Naesala, Sky's Shadow
